group_1.textLeft: What?! You mean you really were just there@to return it?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
I found it in my bag when I got home...

group_1.textLeft: Then...why didn't you just text me?

group_1.textRight: We were fighting, though. I couldn't bring@myself to send a message...
So I thought I'd give it to the Tomorrow Shop's@owner...
...so she could return it to you the next@time you came.

group_1.textLeft: So that's why you brought it all the way@out here....

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: I get it. If you really did steal it, you wouldn't@have brought it here...
Yeah, I believe you. Thank you...

group_1.textRight: No problem.

group_1.textLeft: But still...
How could I have mistaken your bag for mine?

group_1.textRight: I think it's because they both match.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's true.
They're exactly alike.
We really are best friends!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, we are!

group_1.textLeft: Su...Sutan... Please...

group_1.textRight: I'm really sorry...about our fight from@yesterday...

group_1.textLeft: Huh?!

group_1.textRight: I forgot all about it, but back when I used@to go to school,
there were days I didn't want to go, either.
Even though you were really just complaining,@I assumed you were rubbing it in my face.
I'm sorry, Mii.

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm the one who's sorry...
I don't know the story of why you can't@go to school anymore,
but I should have known better than@to complain to you about it...
I'm really sorry, Sutan.

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:1.0][chara:103901:lipSynch_1]Can we be friends again?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'd like that.
Okay, let's shake hands and move on!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: It appears they have it all resolved.

group_1.textRight: I guess this is our cue to slip away.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for your assistance earlier.

group_1.textRight: What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: When those two were fighting,
you reinforced my clumsy attempts at@mediation.
Similarly, when Mikage and I got into that@tiff at home,
you broke up the tension by serving us@a snack.

group_1.textRight: Is that what you had in mind?

group_1.textLeft: It was indeed.

group_1.textRight: ...I have to say you impressed me too,@Lady Nayuta.

group_1.textLeft: How so?

group_1.textRight: We've only lived together for a short time,
but as early as this morning, when I saw you@and Mikage bickering,
I took it as a sign of your immaturity, considering@you complained and sympathized with a fifth grader.

group_1.textLeft: That's a terrible thing to say.

group_1.textRight: That's why I was surprised when I saw you intervene@in that argument. You're stronger than I thought.

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, it's not bad that you think so.

group_1.textRight: Do you need help with something?

group_1.textLeft: N-no...
